<code>

    <script>
    $(function () {
        $.ajax({
            url: "/feed/?f={FORUM_ID}",
            success: function (a) {
                $(".post-entry:first").after('<div style="width:400px;background:#eee;border:1px solid #ddd;padding:4px;margin-top:5px;"><div id="cungchuyenmuc" style="padding:10px 20px;background:#fff;border:1px solid #ddd;"><div class="title">B\u00e0i g\u1eedi c\u00f9ng chuy\u00ean m\u1ee5c</div></div>');
                12 < $(a).find("title").length ? so = 12 : so = $(a).find("title").length;
                for (i = 2; i < so; i++) $('<a href="' + $(a).find("link:eq(" + i + ")").text() + '">' + $(a).find("title:eq(" + i + ")").text() + "</a><br/>").appendTo("#cungchuyenmuc")
            }
        })
    });
    </script>
</code>
